Transcription for 996861

Music
Honoring God, I feel a pleasure,
When we reach His world so close.
Give to me a heart made happy,
The endless pure gold.
How we guard our golden goodness,
There and at the living right.
Come, we are forever singing,
Singing through the day and night.
Give to me a heart made happy,
The endless pure gold.
How we guard our golden goodness,
There and at the living right.
Come, we are forever singing,
Singing through the day and night.
Give to me a heart made happy,
There and at the living right.
Come, we are forever singing,
Singing through the day and night.
How we guard our golden goodness,
There and at the living right.
Come, we are forever singing,
Singing through the day and night.
Give to me a heart made happy,
There and at the living right.
Come, we are forever singing,
Singing through the day and night.
Come, we are forever singing,
Singing through the day and night.
Thank you for watching!
